## WishlistItem type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare type WishlistItem = {
    _id: string;
    id: string;
    code: string;
    sku?: string;
    name?: string;
    productName: string;
    unitPrice: number;
    images: string[];
    variant: {
        id: any;
        code: string;
        product: {
            name: string;
            images: string[];
        };
        channelPricings: ChannelPricing[];
    };
    price?: {
        regular: number;
        special: number;
    };
    selectedVariant: {
        code: string;
        optionValues: ProductOptionValue[];
        product: {
            options: ProductOption[];
        };
    };
};
```
